Create Procedure  dbo.Sp_Rn_$CURSOR$
As
Set NoCount On
Begin 
	/*
		Yazan	: $USER$
		Tarih	: $DATE$
		Açıklama:
	*/
    Begin Try
		
        
    End Try 
    Begin Catch	
        Declare @ObjectName NVarchar(126);
        Set @ObjectName = OBJECT_NAME(@@PROCID);
        Exec SP100_GenerateError @ObjectName;
    End Catch
End
Go
